description:
The Waterton Lakes National Park Map is the ultimate companion for outdoor enthusiasts eager to explore the pristine beauty of the Canadian Rockies' smallest national park, nestled in the picturesque southwest corner of Alberta. Whether you're embarking on a leisurely road trip or venturing into the rugged backcountry, the Waterton Lakes National Park Map is an indispensable tool for your journey.

Photos and detailed trail descriptions for 11 recommended day hikes, ranging from leisurely lakeshore strolls to more challenging alpine adventures, are at your fingertips. We even provide information on four overnight or multi-day trips, along with essential trip planning details, ensuring your safety and enjoyment.
name: Gem Trek Publishing Waterton Lakes National Park Map 5th edition
